metadata.name: ResourceDescriptor::LabelDescriptor
metadata.description:
LabelDescriptor

A definition of a label that can be used to describe instances of a monitored resource type. For example, Cloud SQL databases can be labeled with their “database_id” and their “zone”. See ResourceDescriptor#labels.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
resource_descriptor = logging.resource_descriptors.first
label_descriptor = resource_descriptor.labels.first
label_descriptor.key #=> "database_id"
label_descriptor.description #=> "The ID of the database."

metadata.name: type
metadata.description: The type of data that can be assigned to the label.

returns.description: Returns :string, :boolean, :integer, or nil if there is no type.
